statements: SELECT well_id, well_name, depth, completion_report FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE operator = 'ABC Energy';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE depth > 5000 ORDER BY operator DESC;
SELECT well_name AS name, casing_material, casing_diameter FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE operator = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY depth ASC;
SELECT operator, depth, casing_material FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE depth < 3000 AND casing_material = 'Steel';
SELECT well_name, casing_material, casing_diameter, completion_report FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE well_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE depth > 500 ORDER BY well_name DESC;
SELECT well_name, operator, casing_material FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE operator = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY depth ASC;
SELECT well_name, depth, casing_material, casing_diameter FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE depth BETWEEN 300 AND 700 ORDER BY casing_diameter DESC;
SELECT operator, COUNT(*) AS well_count FROM geothermal_well_construction GROUP BY operator HAVING well_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE casing_material = 'Steel' OR casing_material = 'Cement' ORDER BY well_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_well_construction;
SELECT well_number, drilling_depth, completion_report FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE id = 1;
SELECT casing_type, casing_diameter FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE drilling_depth > 5000;
SELECT * FROM completion_reports WHERE regulatory_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, completion_date, notes FROM completion_reports WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE casing_type = 'Steel' ORDER BY drilling_depth DESC;
SELECT well_number, casing_type, drilling_depth FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE casing_diameter > 10;
SELECT well_number, completion_date, regulatory_compliance FROM completion_reports WHERE regulatory_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT well_number, completion_date, regulatory_compliance FROM completion_reports WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT well_number, casing_type, drilling_depth FROM geothermal_well_construction WHERE drilling_depth > 500 AND casing_diameter < 12 ORDER BY drilling_depth DESC;
SELECT * FROM well_casings;
SELECT casing_type, casing_depth FROM well_casings WHERE well_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM completion_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT well_id, completion_status FROM completion_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT well_id, MAX(casing_depth) AS max_depth FROM well_casings GROUP BY well_id;
SELECT well_id, casing_type, casing_depth FROM well_casings ORDER BY casing_depth DESC
SELECT * FROM completion_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT well_id, casing_type FROM well_casings WHERE casing_type='Steel' OR casing_type='Cement'
SELECT rc.compliance_id, rc.compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance rc JOIN completion_reports cr ON rc.report_id = cr.report_id WHERE cr.completion_status='Completed'
SELECT * FROM well_casings wc JOIN completion_reports cr ON wc.well_id = cr.well_id JOIN regulatory_compliance rc ON cr.report_id = rc.report_id
SELECT * FROM casings;
SELECT casing_id, material, diameter FROM casings WHERE diameter > 10;
SELECT well_id, AVG(depth) AS avg_depth FROM casings GROUP BY well_id;
SELECT well_id, owner_name, contact_email FROM well_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM casings WHERE material = 'Steel';
SELECT well_id, diameter, depth FROM casings ORDER BY diameter DESC;
SELECT completion_date, total_depth FROM completion_reports WHERE average_temperature > 70 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM well_owners WHERE owner_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT compliance_id, inspection_date, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM WellLocations ORDER BY well_name DESC
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM WellLocations WHERE latitude > 40
SELECT well_name, latitude, longitude FROM WellLocations WHERE longitude < -100
SELECT * FROM WellLocations WHERE well_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT well_name, longitude FROM WellLocations ORDER BY longitude ASC
SELECT * FROM WellLocations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT well_name, latitude, longitude FROM WellLocations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT casing_id, casing_material, casing_depth FROM CasingDetails ORDER BY casing_depth DESC;
SELECT report_id, completion_date, report_summary FROM CompletionReports WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, well_id, log_date, SUBSTRING(log_data, 1, 50) AS trunc_log_data FROM WellLogs WHERE well_id = 3;
